### dominatesMergePoint() {#af67eef9e8d101756a1a0164e63eb4556}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool dominatesMergePoint (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; InsertPt, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; AggressiveInsts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> &amp; Cost, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> Budget, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp; TTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42; AC, unsigned Depth=0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
If we have a merge point of an &quot;if condition&quot; as accepted above, return true if the specified value dominates the block.

We don&#39;t handle the true generality of domination here, just a special case which works well enough for us.

If AggressiveInsts is non-null, and if V does not dominate BB, we check to see if V (which must be an instruction) and its recursive operands that do not dominate BB have a combined cost lower than Budget and are non-trapping. If both are true, the instruction is inserted into the set and true is returned.

The cost for most non-trapping instructions is defined as 1 except for Select whose cost is 2.

After this function returns, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> is increased by the cost of V plus its non-dominating operands. If that cost is greater than Budget, false is returned and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> is undefined.

</MemberDefinition>

### hoistConditionalLoadsStores() {#ab99310a04afb6c28186b1a6428eb75b0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void hoistConditionalLoadsStores (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42; BI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpeculatedConditionalLoadsStores, std::optional&lt; bool &gt; Invert)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
If the target supports conditional faulting, we look for the following pattern:

<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  %cond = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  br i1 %cond, label %TrueBB, label %FalseBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">FalseBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  store i32 1, ptr %q, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">TrueBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  %maskedloadstore = load i32, ptr %b, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  store i32 %maskedloadstore, ptr %p, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

and transform it into:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  %cond = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  %maskedloadstore = cload i32, ptr %b, %cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  cstore i32 %maskedloadstore, ptr %p, %cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  cstore i32 1, ptr %q, ~%cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  br i1 %cond, label %TrueBB, label %FalseBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">FalseBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">TrueBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

where cload/cstore are represented by llvm.masked.load/store intrinsics, e.g.


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">%vcond = bitcast i1 %cond to &lt;1 x i1&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">%v0 = call &lt;1 x i32&gt; @llvm.masked.load.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">                      (ptr %b, i32 4, &lt;1 x i1&gt; %vcond, &lt;1 x i32&gt; poison)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">%maskedloadstore = bitcast &lt;1 x i32&gt; %v0 to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">call void @llvm.masked.store.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">                       (&lt;1 x i32&gt; %v0, ptr %p, i32 4, &lt;1 x i1&gt; %vcond)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">%cond.not = xor i1 %cond, true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">%vcond.not = bitcast i1 %cond.not to &lt;1 x i&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">call void @llvm.masked.store.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">           (&lt;1 x i32&gt; &lt;i32 1&gt;, ptr %q, i32 4, &lt;1x i1&gt; %vcond.not)</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

So we need to turn hoisted load/store into cload/cstore.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="BI">The branch instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SpeculatedConditionalLoadsStores">The load/store instructions that will be speculated.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Invert">indicates if speculates FalseBB. Only used in triangle CFG.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

</MemberDefinition>

If this block is a <code>landingpad</code> exception handling block, categorize all the predecessor <code>invoke</code>s into sets, with all <code>invoke</code>s in each set being &quot;mergeable&quot; together, and then merge invokes in each set together.

This is a weird mix of hoisting and sinking. Visually, it goes from: &#91;...&#93; &#91;...&#93; | | &#91;invoke0&#93; &#91;invoke1&#93; / \\ / \\ &#91;cont0&#93; &#91;landingpad&#93; &#91;cont1&#93; to: &#91;...&#93; &#91;...&#93; \\ / &#91;invoke&#93; / \\ &#91;cont&#93; &#91;landingpad&#93;

But of course we can only do that if the invokes share the <code>landingpad</code>, edges invoke0-&gt;cont0 and invoke1-&gt;cont1 are &quot;compatible&quot;, and the invoked functions are &quot;compatible&quot;.

### tryToMergeLandingPad() {#a428f7b53e32934ae46a9aa35d3028d87}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool tryToMergeLandingPad (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/landingpadinst">LandingPadInst</a> &#42; LPad, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42; BI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given an block with only a single landing pad and a unconditional branch try to find another basic block which this one can be merged with.

This handles cases where we have multiple invokes with unique landing pads, but a shared handler.

We specifically choose to not worry about merging non-empty blocks here. That is a PRE/scheduling problem and is best solved elsewhere. In practice, the optimizer produces empty landing pad blocks quite frequently when dealing with exception dense code. (see: instcombine, gvn, if-else sinking in this file)

This is primarily a code size optimization. We need to avoid performing any transform which might inhibit optimization (such as our ability to specialize a particular handler via tail commoning). We do this by not merging any blocks which require us to introduce a phi. Since the same values are flowing through both blocks, we don&#39;t lose any ability to specialize. If anything, we make such specialization more likely.

TODO - This transformation could remove entries from a phi in the target block when the inputs in the phi are the same for the two blocks being merged. In some cases, this could result in removal of the PHI entirely.

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if all the PHI nodes in the basic block \\p BB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="comment">/// receive compatible (identical) incoming values when coming from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all of the predecessor blocks that are specified in \\p IncomingBlocks.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that if the values aren&#39;t exactly identical, but \\p EquivalenceSet</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is provided, and &#42;both&#42; of the values are present in the set,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then they are considered equal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332" lineLink="#a7851d1e39cf3c6f27aa6fe911056a142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a7851d1e39cf3c6f27aa6fe911056a142">incomingValuesAreCompatible</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> IncomingBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &#42;EquivalenceSet = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(IncomingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() == 2 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Only for a pair of incoming blocks at the time!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: it is okay if one of the incoming values is an &#96;undef&#96; value,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        iff the other incoming value is guaranteed to be a non-poison value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: it is okay if one of the incoming values is a &#96;poison&#96; value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a13da92d2694197fbcb5b95fd94e7570d">phis</a>(), &#91;IncomingBlocks, EquivalenceSet&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;PN) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">    Value &#42;IV0 = PN.getIncomingValueForBlock(IncomingBlocks&#91;0&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    Value &#42;IV1 = PN.getIncomingValueForBlock(IncomingBlocks&#91;1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">    if (IV0 == IV1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      return true;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    if (EquivalenceSet &amp;&amp; EquivalenceSet-&gt;contains(IV0) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">        EquivalenceSet-&gt;contains(IV1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">      return true;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    return false;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute an abstract &quot;cost&quot; of speculating the given instruction,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If we have a merge point of an &quot;if condition&quot; as accepted above,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return true if the specified value dominates the block.  We don&#39;t handle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the true generality of domination here, just a special case which works</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="comment">/// well enough for us.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If AggressiveInsts is non-null, and if V does not dominate BB, we check to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="comment">/// see if V (which must be an instruction) and its recursive operands</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that do not dominate BB have a combined cost lower than Budget and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="comment">/// are non-trapping.  If both are true, the instruction is inserted into the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="comment">/// set and true is returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The cost for most non-trapping instructions is defined as 1 except for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Select whose cost is 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="comment">/// After this function returns, Cost is increased by the cost of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="comment">/// V plus its non-dominating operands.  If that cost is greater than</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Budget, false is returned and Cost is undefined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424" lineLink="#af67eef9e8d101756a1a0164e63eb4556"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#af67eef9e8d101756a1a0164e63eb4556">dominatesMergePoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;InsertPt,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;AggressiveInsts,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is possible to hit a zero-cost cycle (phi/gep instructions for example),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so limit the recursion depth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> == <a href="#a1b01002cae53d61fdfeba33d27907dfb">MaxSpeculationDepth</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Try to match Instruction &quot;I&quot; as a comparison against a constant and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// populates the array Vals with the set of values that match (or do not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// match depending on isEQ).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return false on failure. On success, the Value the comparison matched</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// against is placed in CompValue.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If CompValue is already set, the function is expected to fail if a match</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is found but the value compared to is different.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> matchInstruction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isEQ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is an icmp against a constant, handle this as one of the cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42;ICI;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RHSVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &#42;RHSC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pattern match a special case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (x &amp; ~2^z) == y --&gt; x == y || x == y|2^z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This undoes a transformation done by instcombine to fuse 2 compares.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ICI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#aa7414ba9f658ff1287d22a4b8fe81bcb">getPredicate</a>() == (isEQ ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78baa719225e2de4059f93fd3209e1f48218">ICmpInst::ICMP&#95;EQ</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78bac17897ebf2f6a6986280fc3bdf28a30a">ICmpInst::ICMP&#95;NE</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It&#39;s a little bit hard to see why the following transformations are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// correct. Here is a CVC3 program to verify them for 64-bit values:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">         ONE  : BITVECTOR(64) = BVZEROEXTEND(0bin1, 63);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">         x    : BITVECTOR(64);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="comment">         y    : BITVECTOR(64);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">         z    : BITVECTOR(64);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="comment">         mask : BITVECTOR(64) = BVSHL(ONE, z);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="comment">         QUERY( (y &amp; ~mask = y) =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">                ((x &amp; ~mask = y) &lt;=&gt; (x = y OR x = (y |  mask)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">         );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">         QUERY( (y |  mask = y) =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="comment">                ((x |  mask = y) &lt;=&gt; (x = y OR x = (y &amp; ~mask)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="comment">         );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="comment">      &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Please note that each pattern must be a dual implication (&lt;--&gt; or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iff). One directional implication can create spurious matches. If the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implication is only one-way, an unsatisfiable condition on the left</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// side can imply a satisfiable condition on the right side. Dual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implication ensures that satisfiable conditions are transformed to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other satisfiable conditions and unsatisfiable conditions are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transformed to other unsatisfiable conditions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here is a concrete example of a unsatisfiable condition on the left</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implying a satisfiable condition on the right:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mask = (1 &lt;&lt; z)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (x &amp; ~mask) == y  --&gt; (x == y || x == (y | mask))</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Substituting y = 3, z = 0 yields:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (x &amp; -2) == 3 --&gt; (x == 3 || x == 2)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pattern match a special case:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="comment">        QUERY( (y &amp; ~mask = y) =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="comment">               ((x &amp; ~mask = y) &lt;=&gt; (x = y OR x = (y |  mask)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="comment">        );</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="comment">      &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(ICI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a014d851989a66ce781c4f89dfffb26b5">m&#95;And</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aaf522908fe903018eb9b087dd6e49296">m&#95;Value</a>(RHSVal), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(RHSC)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> Mask = ~&#42;RHSC;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Mask.isPowerOf2() &amp;&amp; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getValue() &amp; ~Mask) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getValue()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the target supports conditional faulting,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="comment">/// we look for the following pattern:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cond = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br i1 %cond, label %TrueBB, label %FalseBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="comment">///   FalseBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 1, ptr %q, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="comment">///   TrueBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %maskedloadstore = load i32, ptr %b, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 %maskedloadstore, ptr %p, align 4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and transform it into:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cond = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %maskedloadstore = cload i32, ptr %b, %cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="comment">///     cstore i32 %maskedloadstore, ptr %p, %cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="comment">///     cstore i32 1, ptr %q, ~%cond</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br i1 %cond, label %TrueBB, label %FalseBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="comment">///   FalseBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="comment">///   TrueBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><Highlight kind="comment">/// where cload/cstore are represented by llvm.masked.load/store intrinsics,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="comment">/// e.g.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %vcond = bitcast i1 %cond to &lt;1 x i1&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %v0 = call &lt;1 x i32&gt; @llvm.masked.load.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><Highlight kind="comment">///                         (ptr %b, i32 4, &lt;1 x i1&gt; %vcond, &lt;1 x i32&gt; poison)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %maskedloadstore = bitcast &lt;1 x i32&gt; %v0 to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><Highlight kind="comment">///   call void @llvm.masked.store.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="comment">///                          (&lt;1 x i32&gt; %v0, ptr %p, i32 4, &lt;1 x i1&gt; %vcond)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cond.not = xor i1 %cond, true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %vcond.not = bitcast i1 %cond.not to &lt;1 x i&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="comment">///   call void @llvm.masked.store.v1i32.p0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><Highlight kind="comment">///              (&lt;1 x i32&gt; &lt;i32 1&gt;, ptr %q, i32 4, &lt;1x i1&gt; %vcond.not)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="comment">/// So we need to turn hoisted load/store into cload/cstore.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param BI The branch instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param SpeculatedConditionalLoadsStores The load/store instructions that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><Highlight kind="comment">///                                         will be speculated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Invert indicates if speculates FalseBB. Only used in triangle CFG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671" lineLink="#ab99310a04afb6c28186b1a6428eb75b0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ab99310a04afb6c28186b1a6428eb75b0">hoistConditionalLoadsStores</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;SpeculatedConditionalLoadsStores,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::optional&lt;bool&gt; Invert) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Context = BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// identical order, possibly separated by the same number of non-identical</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2440"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check whether BB&#39;s predecessors end with unconditional branches. If it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2441"><Highlight kind="comment">/// true, sink any common code from the predecessors to BB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2442" lineLink="#a7da8333874d1ad28bd987d4e7c474e53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a7da8333874d1ad28bd987d4e7c474e53">sinkCommonCodeFromPredecessors</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2443"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We support two situations:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (1) all incoming arcs are unconditional</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (2) there are non-unconditional incoming arcs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (2) is very common in switch defaults and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// else-if patterns;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2450"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2451"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (a) f(1);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2452"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   else if (b) f(2);</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// produces:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       &#91;if&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      /    \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2458"><Highlight kind="comment">  //    &#91;f(1)&#93; &#91;if&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      |     | \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2460"><Highlight kind="comment">  //      |     |  |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      |  &#91;f(2)&#93;|</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2462"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       \\    | /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        &#91; end &#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2464"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#91;end&#93; has two unconditional predecessor arcs and one conditional. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2466"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conditional refers to the implicit empty &#39;else&#39; arc. This conditional</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2467"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arc can also be caused by an empty default block in a switch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2469"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In this case, we attempt to sink code from all &#42;unconditional&#42; arcs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2470"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can sink instructions from these arcs (determined during the scan</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2471"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// phase below) we insert a common successor for all unconditional arcs and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2472"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// connect that to &#91;end&#93;, to enable sinking:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2473"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2474"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       &#91;if&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2475"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      /    \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2476"><Highlight kind="comment">  //    &#91;x(1)&#93; &#91;if&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      |     | \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2478"><Highlight kind="comment">  //      |     |  \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2479"><Highlight kind="comment">  //      |  &#91;x(2)&#93; |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       \\   /    |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#91;sink.split&#93; |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         \\     /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//         &#91; end &#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2490"><Highlight kind="normal">      UnconditionalPreds.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(PredBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We take a two-step approach to tail sinking. First we scan from the end of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2498"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// each block upwards in lockstep. If the n&#39;th instruction from the end of each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block can be sunk, those instructions are added to ValuesToSink and we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// carry on. If we can sink an instruction but need to PHI-merge some operands</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (because they&#39;re not identical in each instruction) we add these to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHIOperands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have a conditional edge and we&#39;re going to sink some instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2662"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert a new block postdominating all blocks we&#39;re going to sink from.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2663"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9d391b6acc6d90c9b8a8442324b1aa6f">SplitBlockPredecessors</a>(BB, UnconditionalPreds, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.sink.split&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, DTU))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2664"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Edges couldn&#39;t be split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2665"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2666"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2667"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2668"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2669"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that we&#39;ve analyzed all potential sinking candidates, perform the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// actual sink. We iteratively sink the last non-terminator of the source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks into their common successor unless doing so would require too</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// many PHI instructions to be generated (currently only one PHI is allowed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// per sunk instruction).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2674"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2675"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can use InstructionsToSink to discount values needing PHI-merging that will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2676"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// actually be sunk in a later iteration. This allows us to be more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aggressive in what we sink. This does allow a false positive where we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sink presuming a later value will also be sunk, but stop half way through</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and never actually sink it which means we produce more PHIs than intended.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2680"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is unlikely in practice though.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SinkIdx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; SinkIdx != ScanIdx; ++SinkIdx) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2683"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SINK: Sink: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2684"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; &#42;UnconditionalPreds&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getPrevNode()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2685"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Because we&#39;ve sunk every instruction in turn, the current instruction to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sink is always at index 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><Highlight kind="normal">    LRI.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumSinkCommonInstrs++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2694"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2695"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SinkIdx != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2976"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If this block is a &#96;landingpad&#96; exception handling block, categorize all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2977"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the predecessor &#96;invoke&#96;s into sets, with all &#96;invoke&#96;s in each set</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2978"><Highlight kind="comment">/// being &quot;mergeable&quot; together, and then merge invokes in each set together.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2979"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2980"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is a weird mix of hoisting and sinking. Visually, it goes from:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2981"><Highlight kind="comment">///          &#91;...&#93;        &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2982"><Highlight kind="comment">///            |            |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2983"><Highlight kind="comment">///        &#91;invoke0&#93;    &#91;invoke1&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2984"><Highlight kind="comment">///           / \\          / \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2985"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#91;cont0&#93; &#91;landingpad&#93; &#91;cont1&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2986"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2987"><Highlight kind="comment">///      &#91;...&#93; &#91;...&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2988"><Highlight kind="comment">///          \\ /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2989"><Highlight kind="comment">///       &#91;invoke&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2990"><Highlight kind="comment">///          / \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2991"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#91;cont&#93; &#91;landingpad&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2992"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2993"><Highlight kind="comment">/// But of course we can only do that if the invokes share the &#96;landingpad&#96;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2994"><Highlight kind="comment">/// edges invoke0-&gt;cont0 and invoke1-&gt;cont1 are &quot;compatible&quot;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2995"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and the invoked functions are &quot;compatible&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2996" lineLink="#aa7e215bdd027461da0d8205cf5ef0e32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#aa7e215bdd027461da0d8205cf5ef0e32">mergeCompatibleInvokes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2998"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3053"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine if we can hoist sink a sole store instruction out of a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3054"><Highlight kind="comment">/// conditional block.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3055"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3056"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We are looking for code like the following:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3057"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BrBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3058"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 %add, i32&#42; %arrayidx2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3059"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ... // No other stores or function calls (we could be calling a memory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3060"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ... // function).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3061"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cmp = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3062"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br i1 %cmp, label %EndBB, label %ThenBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3063"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ThenBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3064"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 %add5, i32&#42; %arrayidx2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3065"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br label EndBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3066"><Highlight kind="comment">///   EndBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3067"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3068"><Highlight kind="comment">///   We are going to transform this into:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3069"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BrBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3070"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 %add, i32&#42; %arrayidx2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3071"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ... //</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3072"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cmp = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3073"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %add.add5 = select i1 %cmp, i32 %add, %add5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3074"><Highlight kind="comment">///     store i32 %add.add5, i32&#42; %arrayidx2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3075"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3076"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3077"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\return The pointer to the value of the previous store if the store can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3078"><Highlight kind="comment">///         hoisted into the predecessor block. 0 otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3079" lineLink="#a8bb9afd23da56f99f3bcdb52e9c74320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a8bb9afd23da56f99f3bcdb52e9c74320">isSafeToSpeculateStore</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BrBB,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3080"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;StoreBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;EndBB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3081"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;StoreToHoist = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3082"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!StoreToHoist)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3083"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Speculate a conditional basic block flattening the CFG.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3217"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3218"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this is a very risky transform currently. Speculating</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3219"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions like this is most often not desirable. Instead, there is an MI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3220"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pass which can do it with full awareness of the resource constraints.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3221"><Highlight kind="comment">/// However, some cases are &quot;obvious&quot; and we should do directly. An example of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3222"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this is speculating a single, reasonably cheap instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3223"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3224"><Highlight kind="comment">/// There is only one distinct advantage to flattening the CFG at the IR level:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3225"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it makes very common but simplistic optimizations such as are common in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3226"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instcombine and the DAG combiner more powerful by removing CFG edges and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3227"><Highlight kind="comment">/// modeling their effects with easier to reason about SSA value graphs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3228"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3229"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3230"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An illustration of this transform is turning this IR:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3231"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3232"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3233"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cmp = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3234"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br i1 %cmp, label %EndBB, label %ThenBB</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3235"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ThenBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3236"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %sub = sub %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3237"><Highlight kind="comment">///     br label BB2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3238"><Highlight kind="comment">///   EndBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3239"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %phi = phi &#91; %sub, %ThenBB &#93;, &#91; 0, %BB &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3240"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3241"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3242"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3243"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Into this IR:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3245"><Highlight kind="comment">///   BB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3246"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cmp = icmp ult %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3247"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %sub = sub %x, %y</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3248"><Highlight kind="comment">///     %cond = select i1 %cmp, 0, %sub</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3249"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3250"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3251"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3252"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns true if the conditional block is removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SimplifyCFGOpt::speculativelyExecuteBB(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;BI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3254"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ThenBB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>.SpeculateBlocks)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Be conservative for now. FP select instruction can often be expensive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3259"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BrCond = BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aebd4af5642453ce3169094f08dd3d7b8">getCondition</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3272"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ThenBB == BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;No edge from &#39;if&#39; block?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3273"><Highlight kind="normal">    Invert = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3274"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3275"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(EndBB == BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(!Invert) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;No edge from to end block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l04463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4463"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Choose the minimum alignment. If we could prove both stores execute, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
