<Link id="l04465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4465"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stores executes.  And we don&#39;t know it&#39;s safe to take the alignment from a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4466"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// store that doesn&#39;t execute.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4467"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;setAlignment(std::min(PStore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst/#a3b47950858d6ed72efd1010a35b81caa">getAlign</a>(), QStore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst/#a3b47950858d6ed72efd1010a35b81caa">getAlign</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4469"><Highlight kind="normal">  QStore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4470"><Highlight kind="normal">  PStore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4472"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4473"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4474"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4475" lineLink="#a6a58dfc629e1b208cdd7b2bd76203184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a6a58dfc629e1b208cdd7b2bd76203184">mergeConditionalStores</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;PBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;QBI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4476"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42;DTU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4477"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The intention here is to find diamonds or triangles (see below) where each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conditional block contains a store to the same address. Both of these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// stores are conditional, so they can&#39;t be unconditionally sunk. But it may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be profitable to speculatively sink the stores into one merged store at the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end, and predicate the merged store on the union of the two conditions of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PBI and QBI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This can reduce the number of stores executed if both of the conditions are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4486"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// true, and can allow the blocks to become small enough to be if-converted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This optimization will also chain, so that ladders of test-and-set</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4488"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sequences can be if-converted away.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4489"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4490"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We only deal with simple diamonds or triangles:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4491"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4492"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     PBI       or      PBI        or a combination of the two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4493"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    /   \\               | \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4494"><Highlight kind="comment">  //   PTB  PFB             |  PFB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    \\   /               | /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4496"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     QBI                QBI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4497"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    /  \\                | \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4498"><Highlight kind="comment">  //   QTB  QFB             |  QFB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4499"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    \\  /                | /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4500"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    PostBB            PostBB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4501"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4502"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We model triangles as a type of diamond with a nullptr &quot;true&quot; block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4503"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Triangles are canonicalized so that the fallthrough edge is represented by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a true condition, as in the diagram above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4505"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PTB = PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4506"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PFB = PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4507"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;QTB = QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4508"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;QFB = QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4509"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PostBB = QFB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4510"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we have a good guess for PostBB. If QTB&#39;s only successor is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4512"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// QFB, then QFB is a better PostBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (QTB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>() == QFB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4514"><Highlight kind="normal">    PostBB = QFB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4515"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we couldn&#39;t find a good PostBB, stop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PostBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4518"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4519"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4520"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InvertPCond = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, InvertQCond = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4521"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Canonicalize fallthroughs to the true branches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4522"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PFB == QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4523"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(PFB, PTB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4524"><Highlight kind="normal">    InvertPCond = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4525"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (QFB == PostBB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4527"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(QFB, QTB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4528"><Highlight kind="normal">    InvertQCond = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4529"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// From this point on we can assume PTB or QTB may be fallthroughs but PFB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and QFB may not. Model fallthroughs as a nullptr block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PTB == QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4534"><Highlight kind="normal">    PTB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (QTB == PostBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4536"><Highlight kind="normal">    QTB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4537"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Legality bailouts. We must have at least the non-fallthrough blocks and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the post-dominating block, and the non-fallthroughs must only have one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4540"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// predecessor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4541"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasOnePredAndOneSucc = &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;S) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4542"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> &amp;&amp; BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>() == S;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4543"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4544"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasOnePredAndOneSucc(PFB, PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>(), QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4545"><Highlight kind="normal">      !HasOnePredAndOneSucc(QFB, QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>(), PostBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4546"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4547"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((PTB &amp;&amp; !HasOnePredAndOneSucc(PTB, PBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>(), QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>())) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4548"><Highlight kind="normal">      (QTB &amp;&amp; !HasOnePredAndOneSucc(QTB, QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>(), PostBB)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4549"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4550"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!QBI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;hasNUses(2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4552"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4553"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OK, this is a sequence of two diamonds or triangles.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4554"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if there are stores in PTB or PFB that are repeated in QTB or QFB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4555"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;Value &#42;, 4&gt;</a> PStoreAddresses, QStoreAddresses;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BB : &#123;PTB, PFB&#125;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l04557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4557"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BB)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5006"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is called when we find an icmp instruction</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5009"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pattern that occurs when &quot;A == 1 || A == 2 || A == 3&quot; gets simplified.  In</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5010"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this case, we merge the first two &quot;or&#39;s of icmp&quot; into a switch, but then the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5011"><Highlight kind="comment">/// default value goes to an uncond block with a seteq in it, we get something</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5013"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5014"><Highlight kind="comment">///   switch i8 %A, label %DEFAULT &#91; i8 1, label %end    i8 2, label %end &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5015"><Highlight kind="comment">/// DEFAULT:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5016"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %tmp = icmp eq i8 %A, 92</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5017"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5018"><Highlight kind="comment">/// end:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5019"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ... = phi i1 &#91; true, %entry &#93;, &#91; %tmp, %DEFAULT &#93;, &#91; true, %entry &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l05021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5021"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We prefer to split the edge to &#39;end&#39; so that there is a true/false entry to</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l06826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6826"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to reuse the switch table index compare. Following pattern:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6827"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6828"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (idx &lt; tablesize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6829"><Highlight kind="comment">///        r = table&#91;idx&#93;; // table does not contain default&#95;value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6830"><Highlight kind="comment">///     else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6831"><Highlight kind="comment">///        r = default&#95;value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6832"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (r != default&#95;value)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6833"><Highlight kind="comment">///        ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6834"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6835"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Is optimized to:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6836"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6837"><Highlight kind="comment">///     cond = idx &lt; tablesize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6838"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (cond)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6839"><Highlight kind="comment">///        r = table&#91;idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6840"><Highlight kind="comment">///     else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6841"><Highlight kind="comment">///        r = default&#95;value;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6842"><Highlight kind="comment">///     if (cond)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6843"><Highlight kind="comment">///        ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6844"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6845"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Jump threading will then eliminate the second if(cond).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l06846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6846" lineLink="#ad75372cc26ff6f641159aed90d5fc11e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ad75372cc26ff6f641159aed90d5fc11e">reuseTableCompare</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l07783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7783"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7784"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given an block with only a single landing pad and a unconditional branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7785"><Highlight kind="comment">/// try to find another basic block which this one can be merged with.  This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7786"><Highlight kind="comment">/// handles cases where we have multiple invokes with unique landing pads, but</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7787"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a shared handler.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7788"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7789"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We specifically choose to not worry about merging non-empty blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7790"><Highlight kind="comment">/// here.  That is a PRE/scheduling problem and is best solved elsewhere.  In</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7791"><Highlight kind="comment">/// practice, the optimizer produces empty landing pad blocks quite frequently</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7792"><Highlight kind="comment">/// when dealing with exception dense code.  (see: instcombine, gvn, if-else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7793"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sinking in this file)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7794"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7795"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is primarily a code size optimization.  We need to avoid performing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7796"><Highlight kind="comment">/// any transform which might inhibit optimization (such as our ability to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7797"><Highlight kind="comment">/// specialize a particular handler via tail commoning).  We do this by not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7798"><Highlight kind="comment">/// merging any blocks which require us to introduce a phi.  Since the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l07799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7799"><Highlight kind="comment">/// values are flowing through both blocks, we don&#39;t lose any ability to</Highlight></CodeLine>
